name: Murathan Yildirim

services.title: Custom Application Development
services.description: I help with the creation and development of online or offline applications, with a particular focus on aesthetics and user experience.

services.title: Business Solutions
services.description: I can design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Application Development Design
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: I combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: Design, strategy, management, creative direction, & development are my specialities, and I have had nearly a decade honing in my skills. In all my projects, I find that efficient work- flows, excellent communication skills and a dose of self-discipline are key - a strong work ethic has driven my success in a myriad of specialties.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to people and businesses. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked both as part of a team and individually to develop a utility for testing production web services, Did development on production level code working on products such as NodeJS  MongoDB queries and Angular, Gained experience with both front-end and back-end development fixing bugs and implementing new features, I was responsible for migrating existing service configurations to an updated format allowing for more scalability

education.universityPara: I started with learning Java, advanced to Python and web development since they are inside my interests. Took courses about Data Structure and Algorithms, Databases, various team project classes. I am currently a senior.
